Description:
IN/SD/BI/280721-1 - 311828963
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the trapping point between the tool and the workpiece on the Ormerod slotter (machine no.20), which presents a risk of injury from contact with moving parts including cuts, amputation and entrapment as well as injuries from metal cuttings being ejected from the machine.

N/SD/BI/280721-2 -  311828974
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous parts of the Scharmann 40 Tonne horizontal borer, which presents a risk of injury from entanglement.
